name: home-directory
help: This is the initial folder to use when opening map files.

name: photos-directory
help: This is the initial folder to use when opening local photos.

name: videos-directory
help: This is the initial folder to use when opening local videos.

name: uploads-directory
help: This is the directory to use when uploading files.

name: dropbox-directory
help: This is the directory to use when uploading files from Dropbox.

name: google-directory
help: This is the directory to use when uploading files from Google.
